function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of low-cost opensource hardware may result in lower reliability and accuracy of IEQ data.","Impact":"Inaccurate IEQ data can lead to improper decisions regarding building health and safety measures, potentially endangering occupants.","Mitigation":"Invest in higher-quality hardware and conduct regular calibration and maintenance of sensors to ensure accuracy of IEQ data.","Technologies":"High-quality sensors, regular calibration tools, maintenance software","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, health and safety regulators","Owner":"Facility managers, health and safety regulators"},{"Description":"Deployment of smart IEQ sensor nodes anywhere in the premises may lead to incomplete or uneven coverage of monitoring.","Impact":"Uneven coverage can result in inadequate assessment of IEQ across the entire built environment, leading to problems in identifying and managing environmental health risks.","Mitigation":"Strategically plan the placement of sensor nodes based on building layout and occupancy patterns. Use a combination of fixed and mobile sensor nodes to ensure comprehensive coverage.","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping tools, occupancy tracking systems, mobile sensor nodes","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, health and safety regulators","Owner":"Facility managers, health and safety regulators"},{"Description":"Reliance on WiFi connectivity for IEQ measurements may lead to data transmission issues and interruptions in monitoring.","Impact":"Data transmission issues can result in gaps in IEQ monitoring data, leading to incomplete and unreliable analysis of indoor environmental quality.","Mitigation":"Implement a redundant data transmission system using wired connections or alternative wireless technologies to ensure continuous data flow. Regularly test and troubleshoot the WiFi network for reliability.","Technologies":"Wired connections, alternative wireless protocols, network monitoring tools","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, IT professionals","Owner":"Facility managers, IT professionals"}]}
